ProductInfo.Features:
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby. Support 2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz and 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz frequency. Android 4.2 operating system, better reliability and compatibility.
High performance MTK6589 Cortex A7 Quad Core 1.2GHz CPU, excellent processing platform. 4.5-inch(1280 * 720) IPS 5 point touch capacitive touchscreen.
13 Mega-pixel AF rear carema with flashlight & 5 mega-pixel front camera. 1GB RAM+4GB ROM and support micro SD card / TF card(not included) expansion up to 64GB. Support GPS, Bluetooth 2.0, G-sensor, 802.11 b/g/n Wifi, etc.
Language	Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Cestina, Deutsch, English, Spanish, Filipino, French, Italian, Magyar, Nederlands, Portuguese(Brazil), Portuguese(Portugal), Romana, Vietnamese, Turkish, Greek, Russian, Hebrew, Arabic, Thai, Myanmar, Korean
Product Size	Approx. 13.4 * 6.8 * 0.99cm / 5.28 * 2.68 * 0.39in Product Weight	Approx. 224g / 7.9oz Package Size	Approx. 16 * 9 * 6cm / 6.3 * 3.54 * 2.36in Package Weight	Approx. 360g / 12.7oz
ProductInfo.Name: Cubot GT99 Android 4.2 3G Smartphone 4.5" IPS MTK6589 Cortex A7 Quad Core 1.2GHz 5MP/13MP Dual Shoot 1GB RAM+4GB ROM Bluetooth GPS (White)
